alert.note: Alert for West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern West Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana and south central Wilkinson Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spillman, or 12 miles northwest of Jackson, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Wakefield and Spillman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
